Igor Könhelm's Tome

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 363
corpse lord [corpselord]: +10 #534 Corpse Construct construction

Requires 10A10D to forge (A2D2)

Herr KÃ¶nhelm was famous for his ability to put together parts of corpses and reanimate them with the power of lightning. With the help of this tome, a mage will be able to produce corpse constructs at a much higher rate than normal. The owner of this book will also become much more physically powerful during a storm.
